description: Ubees is dedicated to developing beekeeping projects that promote regenerative agriculture. With operations in 12 countries, including Colombia, the company focuses on enhancing pollination services and diversifying income for small producers through honey sales. Founded in 2017, Ubees combines technology with beekeeping to improve hive management and productivity. Their initiatives aim to protect bee populations, which are crucial for food production, while also increasing the income of local farmers.
name: Ubees
